lender.loan_because: Something someone just need a little help in order to get things going in life I believe every soul you save you save the world and for every soldier that you don't save me hope destroy the world.....
lender.occupational_info: They charter flights strictly by the hour. Their five star services include all amenities with no hidden fees or excessive charges. Their services include an in-flight gourmet food and bar service and door to door limousine service, not to mention our outstanding flight crews. Exotic flights Inc is the realization of twenty-five years of work in the entertainment industry for company president Rudy Gonzalez. Gonzalez, whose experience managing logistics and security for clients like Mike Tyson, Christina Aguilera and others has led him to his newly found position as president and founder of Exotic Flights Inc.

lender.name: frixos
lender.loan_because: i need to loan because i had an accident and i couldn't work for 5 months.so im in the position to own to someone 2850euros.i'm the oldest in my family so i need a breath until i cant stand in my feet.i work now as a stockiste in a shop but i have to payback the 2850euros soonest possible..in 3 months i can payback the loan from here....i don't know you but thank you again...for your time...
lender.occupational_info: its a very good job i like it...and gives me the oppurtunity to do something better in a couple of years if i try..but right now i need help...to stand up

lender.occupational_info:
I received my degree in Communication Arts from the seaside campus of Endicott College ‚Ä®in Beverly, Massachusetts where I studied painting, sculpture, illustration, b&w photography and graphic design. I also had the great, good fortune of studying with renowned master graphic designer, Milton Glaser, at the School of Visual Arts in New York City.
Before launching my graphic design career I embarked on an inner journey of exploration and traveled to the distant land of India where I studied extensively the varied art forms of East Asia as well as its esoteric philosophy. This wellspring of experience has and continues to inspire, influence and enhance every aspect of my creative process.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: My husband was raised in Morocco and was so poor he had no shoes, jackets or toys when he was young. He was very lucky to come to the US and become educated and is now very successful. I want to help others to be able to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: Raising 4 girls in the US who are of Moroccan/American heritage with my husband who is a networking engineer.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurs who work so hard and show such ingenuity.
lender.occupational_info:
I teach folklore and cultural diversity at a university in southern Kentucky. Most of my students will be the first in their family to have a college degree. I admire them, too, and invest all I can in them every day!
I also produce a weekly radio show devoted to music with traditional American roots, and have great sympathy and respect for working musicians.

lender.name: Marco

We are all members of one global community. And in my community, we take care of each other.
